actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: To amend the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to provide an authorization of appropriations.
short_title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Authorization Act of 1992
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: United States Commission on Civil Rights Authorization Act of 1992 - Amends the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to authorize appropriations to carry out the Act. Prohibits use of those funds to create additional regional offices.

titles.title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Authorization Act of 1992
To amend the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to provide an authorization of appropriations.
